code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'../Styles/CartPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartPage=_ref=>{let{cart,setCart}=_ref;const[totalSum,setTotalSum]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{calculateTotalSum();},[cart]);const calculateTotalSum=()=>{const sum=cart.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+parseFloat(item.price.replace('₸','').replace(' ','')),0);setTotalSum(sum);};const removeFromCart=productId=>{const updatedCart=cart.filter((item,index)=>index!==productId);setCart(updatedCart);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u041A\u043E\u0440\u0437\u0438\u043D\u0430"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-list",children:cart.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[item.name," - ",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-button",onClick:()=>removeFromCart(index),children:"\u2715"})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-summary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\u0421\u0443\u043C\u043C\u0430 \u0437\u0430\u043A\u0430\u0437\u0430"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u0421\u0442\u043E\u0438\u043C\u043E\u0441\u0442\u044C \u043F\u0440\u043E\u0434\u0443\u043A\u0442\u043E\u0432: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[totalSum.toLocaleString()," \u20B8"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u0418\u0442\u043E\u0433\u043E: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[totalSum.toLocaleString()," \u20B8"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"order-button",children:"\u041E\u0444\u043E\u0440\u043C\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0437\u0430\u043A\u0430\u0437"})]})]});};export default CartPage;
